info.name: Firebug Dark Theme #1
info.description:
This is a duplicate of an existing theme made by Heo Siu Nhun (Firebug Dark Theme (beta))

Link
https://userstyles.org/styles/111047/firebug-dark-theme-beta

The toolbars used to be changed to a different color, but now they don't seem to be.  I went to GitHub and found the source as well as the new entries needed to re-color the toolbars to be the same as the rest of the theme.

My edits are at the top of the script.
info.additionalInfo:
2016/09/04:
- finally figured out the CSS to make the HTML tag highlight not yellow, and the entire note BG not bright blue
- finally made disabled tabs bg NOT blinding white
- managed to get several of the toolbar elements colored without affecting the Firefox main browser; still need to get HTML breadcrumb selection CSS color
